page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area consists of hills used predominantly for dairy{farming}and rough grazing. New{housing}estates fall within the{commuter belt}of Greater Manchester. The village of{Crawshawbooth}is situated three miles north of {Rawtenstall}in the{Rossendale}Valley of Lancashire. The{village}has one county primary school with 307 children on role and 12 full-time teaching staff. 67 children from the upper juniors have taken part in the Domesday Project Activities, assessing land use in the area and making a count of local amenities. Visits have been made to buildings and places of interest and representatives from local organisations have been interviewed. A questionnaire enabled us to compile a picture of village life.
